<h3 id="X31451">X(31451) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {CIRCUMCIRCLE, INCIRCLE, MOSES}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^2-2*b^2-2*b*c-2*c^2)  :  :

X(31451) = isogonal conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(4445)<br>
X(31451) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 1500, 2242), (3, 31477, 1500)<br>
